attributes.action: help small businesses by cutting utility bills and reducing the VAT burden
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are asking Her Majesty's government to force utility companies to reduce service costs and to abolish VAT for the businesses with a turnover of up to £95,000. We are being crippled with the harsh economic conditions and this is an urgent appeal for the owners of curry houses to safeguard the future of small businesses.
Abu Taher, T&K Balti House, Leicester
